body_html:
I can reproduce this. A simple fix but not complete one is here
aselle@163fd84
After applying it, it works fine for me (basically just need to make the byte_list float32 type instead of int32 type).

There are several uses of deprecated functions in that example. Not sure if @nealwu is planning to fix this as part of moving examples out of TensorFlow, or if @martinwicke has a better suggestion.

body:
I can reproduce this. A simple fix but not complete one is here
https://github.com/aselle/tensorflow/commit/163fd843b787e43f085383eca91dc8dd68d78809
After applying it, it works fine for me (basically just need to make the byte_list  float32 type instead of int32 type).

There are several uses of deprecated functions in that example. Not sure if @nealwu is planning to fix this as part of moving examples out of TensorFlow, or if @martinwicke has a better suggestion.
